description:
Act like an ass in a club and you may get what you you are asking for: an ass kicking by Annie Cruz.
Miss Cruz is petite but able to subdue this jackass, then drag him back to her basement to really fuck with him. She hangs him upside down and beats him till he stammers out a weak apology, then he gets it in the ass for his trouble. The reward, however, is the chance to service that beautiful pussy. There are worse ways to learn a lesson.
title: Revenge
